note.p: Optician and scientific-instrument maker. In partnership with Samuel Charles Tisley at 172 Brompton Road, London, until 1877. Living in Eastbourne in 1911.

person.note:
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/140/118/30), 1911 ((RG14/4835/109)
Chemical News and Journal of Physical Science, 5 December 1873, p. iv England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 November 2017) Wife Mary. E. Spiller in 1901 census.
London Gazette, 31 August 1877, p. 5067.
